page.title: 06Paisley Girls' Fashions
page.content: A survey of girls at our school showed that they have fairly definite ideas about fashions today.{Trousers are by far the most popular, with {skirts}following closely. Dresses are unpopular.The favourite trousers are jeans, but people also wear "catpants" and baggy styles. The favourite skirt style is straight,medium length. "Minis" are popular, with few liking long, full skirts.{The choice of {material}is varied, the most popular being plain and checked. A number of people liked striped, spotted or slogan-printed material. Flower prints currently in vogue with fashion designers, are not so popular.People prefer a subtle look - pastel shades, blacks and greys, instead of bright colours.{Favourite shops}have a wide range of clothes and cater for the {young casual look.
